publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3154.2 David Mundell: Scotland's Air Links-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3154) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from ", in particular" to end and insert "calls upon the Scottish Executive to work with Her Majesty's Government to develop a strategy for ensuring that essential services are provided within a competitive environment that allows low cost airlines to prosper and deliver new and cheaper services."
